definition: to advocate/to initiate/to propose/to be a proponent of (an idea or school of thought)
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

sentences.english: May, who took office earlier this month, is the starkest proponent of this.
sentences.chinese: 本月初就職的梅是這種觀念最鮮明的倡導者。

sentences.english: Even so, many activists say they are packing their bags and heading to Washington.
sentences.chinese: 即便這樣，許多倡導者說他們要收拾行裝上華盛頓。

sentences.english: The advocates of tele-education give their arguments as follows.
sentences.chinese: 遠程教育的倡導者給出了他們的論點如下。

sentences.english: Sakura always advocate that every one on the staff is the host of the business.
sentences.chinese: 櫻花公司始終倡導，每一位員工都是企業的主人。

sentences.english: He hopes that the mechanism for Asian cooperation dialogue proposed by Thailand will make progress.
sentences.chinese: 中方希望泰方倡導的亞洲合作對話機制能取得進展。

sentences.english: The low-salt advocates suggest that all 300 million Americans be subjected to a low-salt diet.
sentences.chinese: 低鹽倡導者們建議全美3億人都加入到低鹽飲食中來。

sentences.english: Second, advocate inclusive growth and increase the endogenous dynamic of economic development.
sentences.chinese: 倡導包容性增長，增強經濟發展內生動力。

sentences.english: The virtue of comity is Chinese nation's fine tradition.
sentences.chinese: 反對爭利，倡導謙讓，這是中華民族的優良傳統。

sentences.english: Dehn himself was a particularly enthusiastic advocate of group diagrams.
sentences.chinese: 戴恩本人就特別熱衷的羣圖解的倡導者。

sentences.english: In teaching college English writing, its of great significance to encourage students to self-correct errors in writing.
sentences.chinese: 在大學英語寫作教學中，倡導學生自我糾錯非常重要。

sentences.english: The principle proponent of the Deep Operations theory, Marshal of the Soviet Union, Mikhail Tukhachevsky.
sentences.chinese: 大縱深戰略理論的倡導者，蘇聯元帥，圖哈切夫斯基。

sentences.english: China has all along supported and advocated complete prohibition and thorough destruction of nuclear weapons.
sentences.chinese: 中國一貫主張並積極倡導全面禁止和徹底銷燬核武器。

sentences.english: Confucianism, the bore Qiu initiated the lofty spirit of morals docile.
sentences.chinese: 儒家，孔丘倡導了道德善良的崇高精神。

sentences.english: Dharma Master not only emphasizes the support of every person's path, he also energetically promotes the transmission of the Precepts.
sentences.chinese: 法師不僅重視個人的行持，還積極倡導戒法的弘傳。

sentences.english: In liberal education punishment no longer exists. Teachers and students are just like friends.
sentences.chinese: 開明教育也將懲戒體罰拒之門外，倡導師生如友。

sentences.english: Finally, Liang Qichao also advocated to modernizing the principles and methods of our education.
sentences.chinese: 最後，梁啓超還大力倡導教育原則與方法的現代化。

definition: to extend/to spread/to popularize/generalization/promotion (of a product etc)
to push (for acceptance of a plan)/to push forward/to promote/to actuate/CL:個|个[ge4]
to construct (often sth abstract, such as good relations)/to set up/to develop/construction (abstract)/architecture
to crane one's neck/to await eagerly/to lead/to show the way
